title: The um lunar revel icon thing

embed.description: Honour the past. Celebrate the future.

body:
so i um... claimed the thing agggeesss ago, and decided to re read all the lunar skin bio things and clicked on the the "claim free gift" tab or whatever and saw that the claim now button was green again, so... clicked it and it said "cool whatever wait 2 weeks" and i was like kk, but then my page refreshed and it said "claim now" again so i did... then i refreshed it again and i said claim now... again lol

so is the claim now button meant to like... refresh itself after you claim it? or isn't it meant to be like "your _____ icon has been unlocked! wait blah" even after i refresh it, bc it just tells me to keep claiming it... OMG THE PILTOVER ICON ONE DID THAT TOO WAYYYY BACK :'( it kept having the claim button refresh itself after i look or refresh the page, whereas the um... zaun icon claim button doesn't do that...

anyway, is it meant to do that? or is it meant to be like the zaun icon one and not have me paranoid that i wont get the fancy icon

replies.body:
Hey there,

Just took a look at this myself, once you've claimed the icon the button should disappear, however upon reloading the page the button will remain until the page has fully loaded, at which point the button will disappear again and be replaced with the text 

>**Your Mark of Fortune Icon has been unlocked. Icons will be granted within two weeks.**

Could you try loading the page **completely**, let me know if the button still remains.

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=AcZcmO6T,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-29T07:44:00.130+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> Just took a look at this myself, once you've claimed the icon the button should disappear, however upon reloading the page the button will remain until the page has fully loaded, at which point the button will disappear again and be replaced with the text 
> 
> Could you try loading the page **completely**, let me know if the button still remains.

oh. my. googoo. it worked :D thank's mister! <3

would i have had to do that with the um piltover one ages ago? :/
